@for (breadscrum of breadscrums; track breadscrum) {
}

Edit Department

Department Mechanical Science Mathematics Computer Civil Automobile Management @if (departmentForm.get('dName')?.hasError('required')) { Select Any Department }
Head Of Department person @if (departmentForm.get('hod')?.hasError('required')) { HOD name required }
Phone phone @if (departmentForm.get('phone')?.hasError('required')) { Phone is required }
Email email @if (departmentForm.get('email')?.hasError('required') || departmentForm.get('email')?.touched) { Please enter a valid email address }
Department Start Date @if (departmentForm.get('sYear')?.hasError('required')) { Please select date }
Student Capacity group @if (departmentForm.get('sCapacity')?.hasError('required')) { Student Capacity is required }
